author: Special Correspondent
text:
A clash between two remand prisoners in Madurai Central Prison here on Tuesday night resulted in the murder of M. Senthil (33) of Vazhaithoppu, who was accused in a murder case.

Police said that Senthil and Senthil Kumar (32) of Kalligudi, accused of murdering his father in January, had been lodged in ‘B’ Block of the prison.

A wordy quarrel that erupted between the two is said to have escalated into fisticuffs around 11.30 p.m. Upon hearing screams, guards rushed to the cell where Senthil was seen lying down with bleeding injuries on his head and face.

According to jail sources, the accused claimed that he punched the victim as he irritated him by jumping and making noise in the night. The two had been put in a separate cell in ‘B’ Block closer to the jail hospital since they were given treatment for mental depression.

After administration of first aid in the jail, Senthil was rushed to Government Rajaji Hospital past midnight, and the doctors declared him brought dead.
title: Prisoner murdered in jail
